entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [release/6.0] CI failure: Banana RID not found in dev-innerloop (sourcebuild) #78197
  • [release/7.0] CI failure: MonoTests.System.Runtime.Caching.CountersTest.Basic_Counters "Category does not exist" #78194
  • Support SETTINGS_MAX_HEADER_LIST_SIZE on HTTP/2 and HTTP/3 #78193
    8.0.0
  • Linux UDP Socket Poll with SelectRead not returning true when ICMP port unreachable available #78188
  • Disposed XamlXmlReader does not close the internal file reader for some constructors #78186
  • "Namespace" is not a supported Runtime Directive #78185
  • Proposal: Trim whole, unused native libraries when PublishTrimmed=true #78184
  • [release/6.0] CI failure in JIT.Math tests run in Browser: NugetSdkResolver failed while attempting to resolve Microsoft.Build.NoTargets/1.0.53 #78183
  • Memory leak from linked cancellation token registrations #78180
  • [API Proposal]: RSA.GetMaxOutputSize #78175
  • If I use more than 8 parameters value types values are setting to false or 0 #78170
  • [linux-arm64] Test failure GC/Scenarios/ServerModel/servermodel/servermodel.sh on #78168
    8.0.0
  • Error 1053: The service did not respond to the start or control request in a timely fashion. #78167
  • Apps crashing when using ZipFile.CreateFromDirectory #78165
  • Using json source generators prevents the possibility to serialize anonymous objects in views #78164
  • [mono] Performance regression in many places caused by #77562 #78163
  • SystemEvents.PowerModeChanged not fireing if computer is put to sleep over start menu #78162
  • Azure Function Project's `func start` results in Could not load file or assembly 'System.Net.Http, Version=7.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a'. The system cannot find the file specified. #78161
  • [API Proposal]: Allow json conversion from arbitrary byte stream #78159
  • [API Proposal]: An extension method similar to "enumerate" or "withIndex" in other languages #78156
  • iOS: the AOT compiler crashes in .NET 8 #78154
  • Do not lock assembly to run `STARTUP_HOOKS` #78153
  • Treat constructor arguments as required properties #78151
  • ArrayList's ICollection ctor fails with multidimensional array #78150
  • After installing VS 17.4, I can't run `dotnet watch` for .NET6 projects #78148
  • LibraryImportGenerator, .NET 7: possible error in the 'Equals' method implementation #78145
    7.0.x
  • Implement Registered I/O for sockets on Windows #78143
  • Inconsistent behavior in NET7 String.Equals #78169
    8.0.0
  • [mono][release/7.0] build libs for android arm64 failed on ubuntu #78141
  • Uninstallation of .NET runtime causes running apps to crash. #78140

Closed

  • MissingMethodException raised from System.Management.WmiNetUtilsHelper during wmi call (.NET6 self-contained) #78038
    Future
  • [jitstress] Assertion failed 'isContainable || supportsRegOptional' in 'JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.General.Program:AbsDouble()' during 'Generate code' #78023
    8.0.0
  • dotnet publish with NativeAOT doesn't copy/bundle native libs from NuGet packages #78191
  • X509Certificates failures in outer loop on CentOS 9 #68911
    Future
  • Regressions in System.IO.Tests.StreamReaderReadLineTests #78176
  • [API Proposal]: Can exception not collect StackTrace? #78031
  • Add support for calling a varargs constructor through IlGenerator.EmitCall #15705
    Future
  • [Perf][Infrastructure] Short-circuit perf job to only run on changes where src or test assets have been changed #9361
    Future
  • Generics #56140
    Future
  • Using CmsSigner ComputeSignature i'm able to digitally sign a document but it's not valid for UE 2015/1506 directive #78166
  • [NativeAOT] Enable card bundles and software writewatch on Windows #75110
    Future
  • ManyConcurrentAddsTakes_ForceContentionWithToArray fails intermittently on osx-arm64 #76501
    8.0.0
  • System.Numerics.BigInteger.TrailingZeroCount is broken for numbers with a lot of trailing zeros. #77720
  • .NET 7 app startup crash - Unhandled Exception in KernelBase.dll #78160
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 16 Regressions on 10/25/2022 7:09:53 PM #77732
    8.0.0
  • Expand Assembly information in exception messages to include more metadata #4178
    Future
  • DateTime debugger display enhancement #4310
    Future
  • CorHost2::ExecuteInDefaultAppDomain() swallows exceptions #4772
    Future
  • Inconsistencies in native callstack (k) and mixed-mode callstack (!sos.clrstack -f) formating #5658
    Future
  • Cross platform remote debugging with lldb-3.8+libsosplugin.so doesn't work #5713
    Future
  • End-to-end R2R versionability test #6125
    Future
  • Debugging with Debugger Type: Auto does not work with .Net Core #6365
    Future
  • [ARM/Linux] dumpil fails with floats #6368
    Future
  • Formatting: create tool to automate only running on files modified in a branch #6648
    Future
  • ReadyToRun: JIT helper not supported: CORINFO_HELP_INITCLASS #6902
    Future
  • GCStress: Handle two-register returns AfterCallProtect #7147
    Future
  • System.Buffers Documentations #19758
    Future
  • Need better diagnostics for EventSource event ID conflicts #7402
    Future
  • Improve StressHeap #7704
    Future
  • Custom modifiers sometimes do not seem to be recognized #7872
    Future
  • Investigate why SOS command 'ClrStack -i' does not work with code created through IMetaDataEmit. #7933
    Future
  • HttpWebRequest BeginGetResponse with Abort test has race conditions #21291
    Future
  • Improve error message when x86/64 bit dlls are inadvertently used together #7975
    Future
  • Desktop: BasicEventSourceTests.TestsWrite.Test_Write_T_EventListener failed with "System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSourceException" #21564
    Future
  • Reduce the number of items in a PLINQ query that are kept alive with respect to the GC #21575
    Future
  • [Local GC] GCToOSInterface TODO: CPUGroupInfo and NumaNodeInfo #8054
    Future
  • [Local GC] Enable feature: STRESS_HEAP #8059
    Future
  • [Local GC] Enable feature: WRITE_BARRIER_CHECK #8062
    Future
  • Use the Event/Provider in Enabled Macros in eventtracebase.h #8082
    Future
  • Add Regression test for Microsoft-Diagnostics-DiagnosticSource EventSource issue #21984
    Future
  • [HttpListener][Porting] HttpListenerContext.WebSocket.CloseOutputAsync(status, null, cancellationToken) has different behaviour for core and netfx #22011
    Future
  • [HttpListener][Managed] HttpListenerWebSocketContext.WebSocket.Dispose should abort, not close the socket #22016
    Future
  • GC Reliability Framework CI job is broken on Ubuntu #8256
    Future
  • StackFrame.GetILOffset returns -1 for ReJITted methods #8296
    Future
  • [Question] Type information in gdb is mixed and incorrect when debugging multiple JIT module #8306
    Future
  • Proposal - Ways to alter large object allocation behavior #8392
    Future
  • Tracking HttpListenerResponseTests.Headers.cs disabled tests #22696
    Future
  • Using Your Build - nuget package #8556
    Future
  • Socket.BeginAccept does not allow socket reuse #22976
    Future
  • MemoryFailPoint not working for Unix #8798
    Future
  • [Local GC] What to do with Volatile<T> and Interlocked #8804
    Future
  • Transport nupkgs are symbol packages, which sometimes fail to be auto-converted to lib packages #8876
    Future
  • Improve concurrency of `runtest.sh` #8958
    Future
  • Weird failure returning multiple levels up the call stack #8965
    Future
  • Compiler generated methods result in unexpected methods in the Event Source manifest. #9007
    Future
  • Activity tracing only has limited opt in capability #9008
    Future
  • Workaround for Windows Workflow tracing. #9009
    Future
  • Why does not HttpClientHandler throw an exception when adding only public portion of client certificate? #23711
    Future
  • EventSource dynamic events (Write<T>) will be dispatched to all listeners regardless whether the listener enabled the source #9105
    Future
  • Failed to create memory dump /mA - GenInvokeEnumStackProviders failed, 0x8007007f #9191
    Future
  • [Local GC] GCToOSInterface TODO: GetLargestOnDieCacheSize #9239
    Future
  • [Local GC] GCToOSInterface TODO: GetLogicalCpuCount #9240
    Future
  • Re-Enable Performance PR Jobs #9320
    Future
  • ETW method/jitstarting events for dynamic methods #9345
    Future
  • [Perf][Infrastructure] Add final accountability leg to perf pipeline pr job #9360
    Future
  • Is possible remove IL code from xxx.ni.dll compiled by CrossGen? #9376
    Future
  • Expose Trace Files In-Proc #9387
    Future
  • restore in instructions #76979
    Future
  • Eager load assemblies in Blazor for Roslyn compilation #78101
  • .net 7 cycles Performance slow #78089
  • Scripts which generate performance event tracing code are difficult to read and maintain #9434
    Future
  • [Default interfaces] Add support for default interfaces in type generator #9479
    Future
  • Provide a runtest script switch to run one or group of *.XUnitWrappers.dll from command line #9497
    Future
  • Provided a CoreFX API Analyzer #24582
    Future
  • Add madvise with MADV_DONTNEED at GCToOSInterface::VirtualDecommit #9521
    Future
  • Dynamic binders fails to properly assign values to by-ref properties or indexers #24621
    Future
  • Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression and Linq.Expressions.BlockExpression #24658
    Future
  • sosdocsunit.txt should not have execute permission set #9564
    Future
  • Implementation of IStructuralEquatable.GetHashCode in Array class should sample from head and tail #24714
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Implement abstraction for marshalling direction in the generator APIs #78196
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Change IMarshallingGenerator.AsNativeType to return ManagedTypeInfo instead of TypeSyntax #78195
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Fix bug in String.Equals unrolling for certain single-char strings #78190
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Create analyzer in ComInterfaceGenerator to enforce the generator is used with IUnknown only #78189
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Fix morph issue with fgOptimizeEqualityComparisonWithConst #78187
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][aot] Prefer concrete instances instead of gshared ones for met… #78182
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/7.0] Fixing memory ordering issue in ConcurrentQueue #78178
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Collections
  • Fix Vector<T> != operator #78177
    area-System.Numerics
  • Fix bug with BigInteger.TrailingZeroCount (#77727) #78174
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Numerics, 7.0.1
  • Exclude dynamic libraries in AppleAppBuilder for iOS device #78173
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix regex fixer to maintain string literal syntax #78172
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [wasm][debugger] Don't need to escape special characters anymore #78171
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Fixes around virtual method hierarchy validation #78157
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix JSON required read-only properties used as parametrized ctor #78152
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [release/7.0] Fix non-determinism in Regex source generator #78149
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.1
  • [release/7.0] Fix performance regression in STJ JsonNode instantiations #78147
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Fixed clang15 build issues #78146
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Single File Test Runner support for Remote Executor #78144
    community-contribution
  • Use forattributename jsgenerator #78136
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0

Merged

  • Introduce `FIELD_ADDR` and use it for TLS statics and instance class fields #77353
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] [ppc64le] Implementation of mono_arch_get_delegate_virtual_invoke_impl method for ppc64le architecture #77788
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] JIT: fix gc hole in peephole optimizations #78109
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.1
  • [release/7.0] Suppress warnings for deprecated keychain APIs #77924
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, os-mac-os-x, 7.0.x
  • Don't consider `lvSpillAtSingleDef` in `WritesAnyLocation` #78181
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bring back fabricbot changes #78129
    area-Meta
  • [release/6.0] Suppress warnings for deprecated keychain APIs #77926
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, os-mac-os-x, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix KeepNativeSymbols to work on mono as well (backport of #66594) #77506
    Servicing-approved, area-Build-mono, community-contribution, 6.0.12
  • [release/7.0] [mono][interp] Fix an issue with deopt and interpreter tiering. #77059
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 7.0.1
  • [wasm] Add Vector128.AndNot intrinsics #78133
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fixing memory ordering issue in ConcurrentQueue #78142
    area-System.Collections
  • [NativeAOT] Enable software writewatch and card bundles on Windows. #77934
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix bug with BigInteger.TrailingZeroCount #77727
    area-System.Numerics
  • Switch `LightupAppActivation` tests to component tests targeting additional deps #78139
    area-Host
  • Add REAMDE.md for ServiceProcess.ServiceController #78124
    area-System.ServiceProcess
  • Reduce host memory usage: don't keep resolved deps around for app lifetime #77987
    area-Host, 8.0.0
  • Remove ENABLE_VISIBILITY_HIDDEN from mono.proj #78155
    area-Build-mono
  • Normalize SIMD comparisons #78027
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix Azure Pipelines build badge in README #78134
    area-Meta
  • Fix a few recent perf regressions in Regex #78003
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.0
  • Fix non-determinism in Regex source generator #78103
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix expensive typo in JsonNode #78130
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Return NULL for mmap fail case on Unix #78069
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Delete `AppDomainIterator` #78078
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Don't copy coreclr version of coreclr and SPCL to core_root when targeting mono #76890
    area-Infrastructure
  • [NativeAOT] Make Frozen collections tests pass with NativeAOT #78005
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Restrict named mutex files permissions #78106
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Fix relative symlink support in TarFile #77338
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Add a VN-based dead store removal phase #77990
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Diagnosing failures #74784
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement unmanaged-to-managed direction for vtable stub generator #77130
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Fix EC curve name case sensitivity on Windows #77801
    area-System.Security
  • Introduce WASM JITs for interpreter opcodes, do_jit_call, and interp_entry wrappers #76477
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Add CollectionsMarshal.SetCount(list, count) #77794
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [MONO] Move Marshal-ilgen into a component #75542
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Adds readme for more extension items #77865
    area-Meta
  • [hot_reload] Add instance fields #76462
    area-EnC-mono
  • Add IndexOfAnyValues #78093
    area-System.Memory, blocked, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] X64 - Minor optimizations for arithmetic and `not` / `neg` #77874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve XmlSerializationWriter.WriteTypedPrimitive #76436
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fix gcc warnings during mono linux-x64 build (backport of #60675) #77505
    Servicing-consider, area-Build-mono, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • [wasi][draft] build WASI #77823
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Linker into runtime2 #78077
    NO-MERGE, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Objective-C: SetMessageSendPendingException and SetMessageSendCallback #77956
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Updating CreateScalar to be intrinsic for Vector64/128/256 #77798
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make Type.IsEnum and Type.GetEnumUnderlyingType intrinsics #71685
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] TAR: Trim file type bits from mode header #77612
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, 7.0.1
  • Fix recursive assembly spec parsing with textual PGO #78035
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Correct minimum memory size value from 200MB to 20MB #77787
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.1
  • [release/7.0] Fix Binding with IList<>, ICollection and IDictionary<,> implementer types #78118
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 7.0.1
  • Remove `fgMorphBlockOperand` #77688
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add readmes for System.Runtime, System.Runtime.Numerics, System.Buffers, System.Runtime.Intrinsics #77332
    documentation, area-Meta
  • Allocate boxed static structs on Frozen Object Heap #77737
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Transform `STRUCT`-typed uses of primitives in local morph #78131
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Clean-up `Microsoft.Win32.Registry` and remove the non-Windows code. #77996
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • Add `DllCharacteristics.ForceIntegrity` and `ControlFlowGuard`. #78072
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono] Fix support for generic custom attributes. #78091
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Subject src-gen serializer to full number-handling tests #78010
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Add support for dehydrated runtime data structures #77884
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Unify invoke code with coreclr #72717
    area-System.Reflection, 8.0.0
  • Cleanup unmaintainable parallel logic with workers #77993
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • Fix a typo. #78105
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Change regMask_enum and regMaskTP to unsigned __int64_t on AMD64. #77571
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Help building ilasm for wasm #2074

Closed

  • Is AOT compatible with WPF? #2076

PullRequests

Created

  • Split RyuJit backend into multiple files #2077
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: bring IL backend inline with scanner - use unconstructed type for unbox #2075

Updated

  • Filament/prolog debug #2069

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet test -p:Platform does not appear to work anymore #29014
  • Test failed in CI: Microsoft.NET.Build.Tests.ReferenceExeTests.ReferencedExeCanRunWhenPublishedWithTrimming(referenceExeInCode: False) #29008
  • Test failed in CI: Microsoft.DotNet.Cli.New.IntegrationTests.DotnetNewUpdateTests.DoesNotPrintUpdateInfoOnCreation_WhenLatestVersionIsInstalled #29006
  • .NET 8.0 is not recognized when dotnet new an 8.0 web app. #28999
  • .Net7 dotnet watch regression: Failed to create MSBuildWorkspace for *.fsproj #28998
  • [NetSDKE2E][Loc]With VS 17.5 preview 2 + .NET 7.0.200-preview.22558.7 installed on Loc OS, the template names for IOS and Mac are unlocalized after running "dotnet new --list" in CLI . #28997
  • Unable to install .NET 7 on Ubuntu 22.04.1 on WSL #28995
  • dotnet workload install always displays "The machine has a pending reboot. Installation will continue, but you may need to restart." #28993

Closed

  • Coverage output paths are being ignored after update to .NET 7 #28952
  • `dotnet test` cannot handle MSBuild command line arguments #28983

PullRequests

Created

  • Add new option for json output of dotnet list package to release 7.2.xx branch #29017
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29016
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #29011
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix templating support for multiple parameters with same prefix #29010
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-dotnet new
  • Fix TargetPlatformVersion normalization for Windows #29009
  • Simplify output testing #28994
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #28948
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #28996
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Handle test parser forwarded args #27961
    Servicing-approved, Area-DotNet Test, Area-CLI, cli-ux, 7.0.1
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Backport Add Blazor SWA Baseline Mismatched Assets Logging #28894
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #28989
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #28930
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.4xx #28946
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update to the RTM version of 7.0 #28949
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Add new option for json output of dotnet list package #28564
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2042456 #28957
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the sdk build to target net8.0 #28563
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.1xx] ResolveReadyToRunCompilers: map non-portable rids when targetOS is determined (backport #28380) #28782
    Servicing-consider, Area-ReadyToRun
  • Retarget Microsoft.Extensions.DotNetDeltaApplier to netstandard2.1 #28984
    Servicing-consider, Area-Watch
  • Template verifier adoption in CommonTemplateTests #28707
    Area-dotnet new, Area-Common templates
  • Introduce Roslyn-based GenAPI #28967
    Area-GenAPI
  • Use architecture specific DOTNET_ROOT variable name #27566
    Area-Infrastructure, feature-dotnetwatch, Area-CLI, Area-Watch
  • Make PublishAot an optional feature because Mono does not support it. #28674
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add property builder helper #23730
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Deps.json should include project references that aren't present in project.assets.json #28963
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-10
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Allow `abstract` `static` members on classes, not only interfaces. #6684
  • Proposal: Simplify redirection property to reduce boilerplate code #6675

PullRequests

Created

  • Update ref-safe-to-escape of ref parameters to return only #6688
  • Clarify lambda defaults/`params` breaking change langversion #6682

Merged

  • Correct example in params working group notes #6679

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support preprocessor name in ScriptOption #65344
  • Filter out File-scoped types from ImportCompletion #65339
    17.5 P2
  • Negative number in pattern matching #65338
    17.5
  • C# document outline add region #65333
  • IConversionOperation.IsChecked returns false in checked context for explicit nullable conversion #65331
  • Introduce StateKind.AttemptingToComplete for partial analysis state tracking #65330
  • IDE0010 should not complain about missing default case? #65326

Closed

  • Function pointers do not have documentation id #65345
  • CSharpArgumentProvider tests are flakey. #63174
    17.4
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33110.143 #65347
  • `[UnscopedRef]` ignored on `ref` parameter from metadata of `ref struct` type #64778
    17.5
  • Error reported annotating ref parameter with [UnscopedRef] #64569
    17.5
  • RIT tool should not create insertion PR if diff is only in whitespaces #28787
  • "Convert to interpolated string" should be an analyzer, not just a refactoring #31828
    Backlog
  • "Convert to interpolated string" should be offered on Console.WriteLine #31829
    Backlog
  • Code fix for CS0119 to insert 'typeof' #31836
    Backlog
  • PVS-Studio: Checking the Roslyn Source Code #34725
  • Where is Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.EditorFeatures* greater than v2.9.0? #34819
    Backlog
  • brace matching wrong #35346
    Backlog
  • KeywordCompletionProvider does not consider CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture #35705
    Backlog
  • Malformed Elastic WhiteSpace Trivia in CodeFix test #65343
  • Lambdas throwing exception infer to Func<object> overload instead of Action #18952
    Backlog
  • Code cleanup runs too slow when there are a lot changes #28272
    Backlog
  • Analyzers have a different result for build and intellisense #28582
    Backlog
  • Codeanalysis.Renamer.RenameSymbolAsync not finding or renaming all function symbols in class #28726
    Backlog
  • VisualStudioSymbolSearchProgressService throws ArgumentNullException under debugger #27098
    Backlog
  • How to obtain the value in the ISymbol #65334

PullRequests

Created

  • Ensure 'when' keyword shows up in a filter-clause in a switch pattern. #65346
    Area-IDE
  • Exclude type declared as `file` from import completion #65342
    Area-IDE
  • Add F1 help keyword for `notnull` and `unmanaged` constraints and `switch` expressions #65341
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65340
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Better infer tuple type for `Fix return type` codefix #65335
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fix LSP workspace diagnostics exception when a solution contains a project with no file path #65328
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Optimize codegen for tuple swap scenarios #65327
    Area-Compilers

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Upgrading from 6.0.11 to Microsoft.Aspnetcore.Signalr.Client 7.0 introduced System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException #45012
  • Continue reducing the size of Blazor WebAssembly apps #45010
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Blazor Hybrid + Web #45004
  • Web API broken in .NET 7.0 after trimming #44997
  • Cannot receive push data from API when build app release with proguard android #44993
  • dotnet 6 app stopped working after update to VS 2022 17.4 #44991
  • Method 'get_ServerSideSessions' in type 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.ApiAuthorization.IdentityServer.ApiAuthorizationDbContext`1' from assembly 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.ApiAuthorization.IdentityServer, Version=7.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=adb9793829ddae60' does not have an implementation. #44990
    Discussions
  • ASP.NET Core Module v2 17.0.22292.0 Very serious bug #45006

Closed

  • ASPNetCore v7.0.0 failing to build: Missing NuGet's #44962
  • Link is mis-rendering based on the current page #24455
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Blazor WASM app fails to launch with 7.0 runtime and 6.0.10 packages #44963
  • Perf improvement: https #44995
  • Blazor WASM project won't build due to missing browser-wasm 7.0.0-rtm.22473.12 package #44872
    7.0.x
  • QuickGrid Sorting - JSON Parsing Error #44851
  • [FromBody] parameter is null #44992
  • Allow Blazor components with [Parameter] attributes on properties to be aware of the required modifier. #44974
  • Blazor compatibilty with Wisej using custom elements #44982
  • Migration from 6 to 7 gives Uncaught SyntaxError: import.meta may only appear in a module #44996
  • PersistentComponentState: persist state outside OnPersisting callback #44936
  • Argument "3": Cannot convert from „Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.EventCallback<System.DateTime>” on „System.Action<System.DateTime>” #44955
  • Blazor Wasm MSAL authentication stuck on logging in when msal.js returns "Operation Completed" #43317
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Monitor HTTP response buffer to detect lagging #44761
  • dynamic endpoint in controller #44790

PullRequests

Created

  • [main] Match strangely formatted PathBase in HttpSys & IIS #42751 #45011
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • Add template for analyzer/codefixer proposals #45009
    area-infrastructure
  • [7.0] Match strangely formatted PathBase in HttpSys & IIS #42751 #45008
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 7.0.1
  • gRPC JSON transcoding - msbuild includes proto dependencies #44999
    area-grpc

Merged

  • Update branding to 2.1.39, merge internal commits #44951
    tell-mode, 2.1.39
  • [release/7.0] source-build: support building aspnetcore using non-portable runtime packages. #44978
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [6.0] Match strangely formatted PathBase #42751 #44753
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.12
  • Revert init-nuget workaround #45005
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #44949
  • Fix `Excepted` -> `Expected` typos in repo #44989
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview1
  • [release/7.0] source-build: don't use crossgen when building for mono runtime. #44977
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [release/2.1] nit: Update `$(RepositoryUrl)` #44994
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x

Updated

  • Bump SDK to 8.0.100-alpha.1.22556.1 #44925
    area-infrastructure
  • Use the Regex source generator in the AlphaRouteConstraint. #44770
    area-runtime
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2042165 #44686
    area-infrastructure
  • Update selenium dependency versions #44834
  • Add IgnoreQueryString parameter to NavLink #40990
    area-blazor, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Android] Window currently doesn't apply AdjustPan so the view doesn't pan up (scroll) when the keyboard opens #11274
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • CollectionView virtualization does not work when using a DataTemplateSelector #11272
  • [Enhancement] Remove a specific Modal Page #11271
  • [Bug] ModalStack is broken (PushModalAsync, PopModalAsync [Android]) #11270
  • MenuBar items currently don't aggregate from parent pages to child pages #11268
    Backlog
  • [Catalyst] Shell - The toolbar remains when you push to a new page and the new page doesn't need to have a title bar #11267
    Backlog
  • Wrong button sizing when using CharacterSpacing - MAC #11265
  • Android webview is only loading "about:blank" when using custom WebviewClient with .Net 7.0 #11264
    Backlog
  • Shell.Title and Window.Title currently doesn't propagate to the catalyst window title #11263
    Backlog
  • Unloaded not fired on components when window is closed #11262
    Backlog
  • Java.Lang.IllegalStateException: Can not perform this action after onSaveInstanceState #11259
    Backlog
  • IImage Resize Cannot access a disposed object - Android #11255
    Backlog
  • Publish Maui app as exe not work on window 10 - continue #11254
  • Text alignment not respected in migrated project #11251
    Backlog
  • Can't run my MAUI program on an android emulator #11249
  • [foldable] `SpanModeStateTrigger` not responding to span/unspan events #11245
    Backlog
  • .NET MAUI Blazor CSS Missing on Hot Reload #11242

Closed

  • [Android] Stream.Length is not supported from asset #7471
  • Maui should default PublishReadyToRun true on Windows Release #6025
  • Multiple Selection On Collection View #11023
  • DEP1000: Cannot copy file #11044
  • Maui Windows Button Images do not display #6570
  • .Net Maui ImageButton Problem #11163
  • [Windows] Images are not rendered if the extension is not specified #3459
    Backlog
  • Failed publishing for Android with System.ArgumentException: An item with the same key has already been added #6531
  • Get native Window handle from control #6843
  • Cannot publish freshly created MAUI app as documented #7003
  • Error with Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Sqlite on iOS Release mode #11266
  • [Bug] ModalStack is broken (PushModalAsync, PopModalAsync [Android]) (Remove Page [All Platform]) #10543
  • MAUI Handler Require VS Cleaning #11161
  • MauiSplashScreen resizetizering issue #11160
  • Add position to DragGestureRecognizer and DropGestureRecognizer events #11256
  • Invalid IL in Microsoft.Maui.Handlers.NavigationViewHandler #11258
  • Checking Permission status throw exception instead of returning the status #11032
  • Errors after upgrading app from framework 6 to 7. #11217
    Backlog
  • Grid columns inside FlexLayout do not adjust their size correctly on Android #11079
  • Shell Flyout is Blank When Entry is Clicked First #8311
    Backlog
  • [Bug] UriImageSourceService fails to load some images on Windows #2601
  • Shell with content does not appear on iPad with OS 14.4.2 #7781
  • DVTItunesSoftwareServiceFoundation error deploying to iOS device #11158
  • Use BindableProperty on a self contained component #10542

PullRequests

Created

  • CodeQL only on main/non-public builds #11273
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [foldable] add TypeConverter to Pane1Length/Pane2Length properties #11269
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-twopaneview
  • Clean up the files in the xml-docs artifacts #11257
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix up the Shipped/Unshipped APIs #11244
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix up the Shipped/Unshipped APIs #11243
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • If a UISwitch grows too wide it is no longer accessible #10946
    area/a11y
  • Revert "[android] bring back `$(AndroidLinkResources)` by default" #11096
    area/single project ☝️, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [net7.0] Fix Entry ClearButtonVisibilityProperty pointing to SelectionLength #11250
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22553.2 to 7.0.0-preview1.22559.1 #11216
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Increase timeout to 240 minutes of azdo stages #11226
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump Microsoft.VisualStudio.DesignTools.Extensibility from 17.3.32804.24 to 17.4.33103.184 #11215
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Fix Entry ClearButtonVisibilityProperty pointing to SelectionLength #11234
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-entry

Updated

  • [Windows] Fix tablet mode detection #11135
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Add missing await call for color match test #11016
    area/controls 🎮
  • [Android] Fix SwipeItemView size issues #10522
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Add nicer metadata to our NuGet packages #11219
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix Switch Off Track Color - Fixes #10099 #10758
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-switch
  • Merge net7 to main #11202
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Windows] Changes in SwipeViewHandler #11229
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NullReferenceException in NavigationFixer when adding entity with many-to-many joins #29535
  • Generated Model Snapshot throws InvalidOperationException #29534
  • Obsolete IModelCustomizer #29533
  • Query/Test: add overload to AssertQuery that exposes DbSets directly, rather than ISetSource #29532
  • 6.0.11 to 7.0.0: [...] are both mapped to column [..] but are configured to use differing provider types ('double' and 'double?').' #29531
  • Idempotent migration script not working on EFCore7.0 for AlterColumn when nullable changed from true to false #29530
  • dotnet publish command line started showing ADO issues at runtime #29529
  • Keyless entity without a table - broken in 7.0 #29528
  • Empty formatted output string for connection debug log #29527
  • Mirosoft.Data.Sqlite 7.0, System.TypeInitializationException thrown when load Microsoft.Data.Sqlite.dll from embeded resource #29526

Closed

  • Query/Test: convert FromSql tests to use query infra #29365
    8.0.0
  • EF core 7 build generates warnings #29525

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix to #29365 - Query/Test: convert FromSql tests to use query infra #29402
    auto-merge

Updated

  • Proposed fix to #7172 - Consider non-default column collation in table variable #29518
  • Fix to #17066 - Query: Translate ElementAt(OrDefault) #29496
